description: Two new studies from UC Santa Cruz propose that dark matter may have originated from a hidden mirror world or been radiated into existence by the universe’s expanding cosmic horizon. These theories, rooted in established physics, challenge traditional models and suggest dark matter could exist without interacting with ordinary matter, redefining one of modern science’s greatest mysteries.
title: Dark Matter Theories Suggest Hidden Mirror World and Origins at the Edge of the Universe

description: In a recent study published on July 24 via arXiv, astronomers from Wuhan University have detailed the powerful X-ray outburst of the Be/X-ray binary system RX J0440.9+4431. Using China’s Insight-HXMT satellite, the team tracked the event from its eruption in December 2022 through March 2023.
title: Chinese Astronomers Use Insight-HXMT to Decode X-ray Outburst of Binary Star System

description: ESA’s JUICE spacecraft scanned the famous Earthrise crater on the Moon to test radar for future exploration of Jupiter’s icy moons. The data confirmed JUICE’s radar accuracy, setting the stage for a search for life beneath Europa and Ganymede. The crater, immortalised in a 1968 Apollo 8 photo, now plays a role in extraterrestrial science.
title: ESA JUICE Mission Scans Jupiter's Lunar Crater in Test Run for Alien Life

description: The James Webb Space Telescope has re-imaged part of Hubble’s Ultra Deep Field, revealing over 2,500 galaxies in stunning infrared detail. Using its NIRCam and MIRI instruments, Webb observed faint galaxies dating back to just a few hundred million years after the Big Bang. This is part of the JADES survey, which includes the deepest mid-infrared image ever taken and redshift measurements for 178 early-universe galaxies.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Reimagines Hubble’s Deep Field, Unveils Ancient Galaxies

description: At 3:46 a.m. EDT, Crew-11 entered the International Space Station after the SpaceX Dragon hatch opened, officially joining Expedition 73. The arrival, streamed live on NASA+, highlighted ongoing international collaboration and commercial spaceflight efforts. NASA’s social platforms shared visuals of the crew’s welcome, reinforcing transparency and public engagement in human space exploration.
title: NASA's SpaceX Crew-11 Enters International Space Station, Joins Expedition 73

description: On August 5, 2025, Rocket Lab launched Japan’s QPS-SAR-12 satellite, nicknamed Kushinada-I, aboard its Electron rocket from Mahia, New Zealand. Built by the Institute for Q-shu Pioneers of Space (iQPS), the satellite joins a growing constellation of synthetic-aperture radar (SAR) spacecraft designed for high-resolution, all-weather, day-and-night Earth observation.
title: Rocket Lab Launches Kushinada-I Satellite to Orbit for Japan’s iQPS

description: After a 22-day period of solar calm, the Sun unleashed three M-class solar flares on August 3–4, 2025, all originating from active sunspot region AR 4168. These moderate flares released intense radiation, capable of briefly disrupting high-frequency radio signals and potentially sparking auroras at high latitudes. Scientists also detected likely coronal mass ejections, which may graze Earth.
title: Sun Erupts with Triple Solar Flares After Weeks of Silence

description: Elista has launched its new QLED smart TV range in India. The new smart TV lineup runs on Google TV and is offered in 32-inch, 43-inch and 55-inch display sizes. The 55-inch model supports 4K UHD with HDR10, while 43-inch and 32-inch versions deliver full-HD and HD output.
title: Elista QLED Google TVs With Up to 4K Resolution, Dolby Audio Launched in India

description: iPhone 17 series could be inching towards launch. The lineup is expected to include four models: the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max. Now, a new leak reveals the possible launch date of the lineup. The launch could happen in the second week of September and the phones could go on sale before the end of the month.
title: iPhone 17 Launch Date Leaks, Telling Us When to Expect Apple's Upcoming iPhone Models

description: A tipster claims the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra will retain the 200-megapixel ISOCELL HP2 main sensor from the S25 Ultra but may feature an upgraded f/1.4 aperture, compared to the current f/1.7. This enhancement is expected to significantly improve low-light photography, reduce smearing and noise, and deliver better image clarity. The shallower depth of field may also enhance bokeh effects, making the phone more effective for portrait shots while producing brighter, more detailed images overall.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Tipped to Offer Improved Low-Light Camera Performance

description: Asus has announced that select laptops will soon be available for purchase via Swiggy Instamart in Indian cities like Bangalore, Delhi NCR, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Chennai, Pune, and Kolkata. Available models include the Vivobook Go 15, Vivobook 15, and TUF Gaming F16, starting at Rs. 33,990. The Vivobook models offer 15.6-inch displays with AMD or Intel processors. The TUF Gaming F16 features an Intel Core 5 CPU, RTX 3050A GPU, 144Hz 16-inch display, RGB keyboard, and ships with Windows 11.
title: Asus Partners With Swiggy Instamart to Offer Instant Delivery of Laptops

description: Early tests disappointed customers last year, but Intel has said its 18A is on track to make its "Panther Lake" laptop semiconductors at high volume starting in 2025, which include next-generation transistors and a more efficient way to deliver power to the chip.
title: Intel Said to Be Struggling With Key Manufacturing Process for Next PC Chip

description: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE leaks have been surfacing online for a while, indicating an imminent launch. Now, the true wireless stereo (TWS) has been spotted on the Bureau of Indian Standards website, which signals that it might launch in India soon. Additionally, the ‘Fan Edition’ TWS was also spotted on the IECEE certification website, revealing its battery capacity.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE Battery Specifications Listed on Certification Websites; Could Launch in India Soon

description: Tesla recently opened its first showroom in Mumbai. The company has also launched its first charging station in the city. Now, the company is reportedly sending out invites to its second showroom in the country, which is expected to take place in New Delhi next week, according to a report. Here's everything you need to know about Tesla's second showroom in India.
title: Tesla’s Second Showroom in India Will Open in New Delhi on August 11: Report

description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman teased the company’s upcoming frontier artificial intelligence (AI) model, GPT-5, on Sunday. In a social media post, the executive shared a screenshot of a query and its response, highlighting the improvements in text generation that the model will bring. Notably, previous reports have claimed that the GPT-5 AI model could be released in August, although the company has not officially confirmed this.
title: This Is What GPT-5 Looks Like: What’s Different from GPT-4?

description: The Amazon Great Freedom Festival sale is now live for all users. The sale brings discounts of a wide range of gaming peripherals, from controllers to keyboards. Here are our picks for some of the best gaming accessory deals during the ongoing Amazon sale.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale: Best Deals on Gaming Peripherals

description: Apple is said to be planning to bring the tandem OLED display technology, first seen in the M4 iPad Pro, to future iPhone models. The display technology could potentially start with the 2028 lineup. Apple is said to be in discussions with LG and Samsung about producing tandem OLED displays.
title: Apple Reportedly Evaluates Tandem OLED Technology for Future iPhone Models

description: The ROG Strix Scar 16 2025 is one of Asus’ hero machines for this year. It now comes with a newer Intel Core Ultra Series 2 processor and the Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 series Laptop GPU. The new model features more RGB lighting and the customisable AniMe Vision dot-matrix LED display on the lid. There’s also a new tool-less removable rear panel and improved cooling.
title: Asus ROG Strix Scar 16 2025 Review: Powerful and Flashy

description: The Department of Telecommunications’ (DoT) Financial Fraud Risk Indicator (FRI) has reportedly blacklisted between 3,00,000 to 4,00,000 SIM cards that were linked with fraudulent activities. As per the report, the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered tool is flagging as many as 2,000 high-risk phone numbers on a daily basis.
title: DoT’s Financial Fraud Risk Indicator Reportedly Blacklists 400K SIM Cards Linked to Fraudulent Activities

description: The Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 began on July 31, offering major discounts on furniture, fashion, electronics, and home appliances. Top brands like Samsung, iQOO, Vivo, Acer, and Lenovo are part of the sale, with additional savings via coupons, exchange offers, and bank discounts. SBI credit card users get a 10 percent instant discount, while select cards offer up to Rs. 2,000 cashback. Amazon Pay users can earn up to Rs. 5,499 cashback. Here we have compiled the top deals on Samsung smartphones.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale: Top Deals on Galaxy S25 Ultra, S25 Edge, M36, and More Samsung Phones

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025 began on July 31 at noon for everyone in India. It enables shoppers to avail of hefty discounts on a wide range of electronics. If a OnePlus handset is what’s on your shopping list, then our latest article comprises some of the best offers currently available on OnePlus smartphones.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale: Top Deals on OnePlus 13R, Nord 5, Nord CE 5, and More OnePlus Smartphones

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 is currently live in India. If you're planning to buy a 2-ton AC, we've rounded up some of the top deals and offers on air conditioners from brands like Samsung, Godrej, and LG available on Amazon right now to help you make an informed choice while making your next AC purchase. Read on to know about the top deals on 2-ton ACs during the Amazon Great Freedom Festival sale.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Top Deals on 2-Ton ACs

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 began on August 31 at midnight for Prime subscribers, giving them early access to the sale event. For the non-Prime members, it started at noon on the same day. During its Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025, the e-commerce company is offering electronics from several brands across product categories and price ranges at discounted prices.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale: Top Deals on Performance Laptops Under Rs. 70,000

description: Perplexity is said to be illegitimately accessing content from websites despite being prohibited from doing so. Cloudflare, a global web security services company, conducted a test to confirm the stealth behaviour of the answer engine company. The researchers highlighted that not only were crawler bots from Perplexity ignoring the directives from the websites, but they were also actively hiding their identity via multiple means to ensure website owners could not track the activity.
title: Perplexity Is Using Stealth Bots and Breaking Website Directives to Fetch Data, Says Cloudflare

description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Enterprise Edition, listed on Samsung Germany's website, is available only in a Jetblack shade with a 512GB storage variant. It offers a three-year warranty and one year of free Samsung Knox Suite. The phone features an 8-inch QXGA+ foldable AMOLED display and a 6.5-inch full-HD+ cover screen, both with 120Hz refresh rates. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chip, it includes a 200-megapixel triple rear camera unit and two 10-megapixel front cameras.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Enterprise Edition Launched With Extended Warranty, Samsung Knox Suite

description: WhatsApp is reportedly rolling out a new feature that will potentially allow users to message people who do not use the instant messaging service. The Meta-owned company is said to be releasing this new functionality as part of its Google Play Beta program for Android phones.
title: WhatsApp's Guest Chats Feature Could Enable Communication With Users Who Don't Have an Account

description: iPhone 18 series is expected to be unveiled in late 2026. As part of the series, the Cupertino tech giant could launch a foldable phone. However, the company is reportedly also working on an iPhone variant with an 18.8-inch foldable display, whose mass production has been delayed, potentially postponing its launch too.
title: Apple Said to Delay Launch of Larger 18.8-Inch Foldable Device Beyond 2027

description: EA has detailed the maps, modes, and challenges that will be available across Battlefield 6's two open beta events in August. Players will be able to access four maps and seven modes across two open beta weekends.
title: Battlefield 6 Open Beta Maps, Modes and Challenges Detailed, Pre-Loading Now Available

description: ChatGPT and generative artificial intelligence (AI) technology in general have changed the way people search for information. From finding out how many runs Virat Kohli scored in the ongoing calendar year in ODI (275 runs, if you wanted to know) to learning about astronomy and space, typing the right prompt can provide all the information in seconds. Take Excel sheet formulas for example.
title: How to Use ChatGPT Prompts to Write Excel Formulas Easily

description: An alleged image of the iPhone 17 Air’s L-shaped battery shows a steel-encased cell just 2.49mm thick. The phone is expected to be 5.5mm thin and may feature a 2,800mAh battery, much smaller than the iPhone 16 Plus's 4,674mAh cell. Expected features of the handset include an A19 chip, a 6.6-inch 120Hz OLED display, a 48-megapixel rear camera and a 24-megapixel front camera.
title: iPhone 17 Air Battery Spotted in Leaked Images That Hint at Exceptionally Slim Profile

description: OpenAI on Monday announced new improvements in ChatGPT that will allow the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot to better cater to users’ digital well-being. These are not new features, per se; instead, these are backend changes made to the chatbot and the underlying AI model to tweak how it responds to users.
title: OpenAI Adds Break Reminders to ChatGPT, Tightens Policy on Personal Advice

description: Oppo K13 Turbo series is set to be launched in India on August 11, the company has announced. The lineup will comprise two models, which have already been introduced in China. The Oppo K13 Turbo and K13 Turbo Pro are confirmed to come with an active cooling system for efficient heat dissipation.
title: Oppo K13 Turbo Series With Built-in Active Cooling Fans to Launch in India on August 11

description: Samsung Galaxy A17 smartphone has been spotted on retailer websites, hinting at its price, design and specifications. It could launch in three colour options with a triple rear camera unit. It is expected to be powered by an Exynos 1330 chipset. It could feature a 5,000mAh battery with support for 25W wired charging.
title: Samsung Galaxy A17 Design, Price and Specifications Revealed via Retail Websites

description: Spotify Premium subscription will now cost more in India, Europe, the Middle East, and select other markets. The streaming service announced its price hike on Monday, and it will be applicable to all of its plans. Users will have to pay more to continue uninterrupted access to ad-free music, along with other benefits.
title: Spotify Premium Gets More Expensive in India, Europe, Middle East, and Select Other Markets

description: Character.AI, the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered social app, is bringing its community feed to mobile apps. Announced on Monday, the California-based AI company is now adding a social feed to its platform where users can share different kinds of posts about their created characters and the ones they've been interacting with. Once shared, the community can also interact with it in multiple ways.
title: Character.AI Releases AI-Native Social Feed to Mobile Apps, Lets Users Interact With Posts

description: Google Pixel 10 series will be launched on August 20. As we wait for the formal reveal, the tech giant has shared a new teaser video. Google's latest teaser highlights Apple's ongoing postponement of several key Apple Intelligence features. Google is expected to position the new Pixel 10 as an AI-ready smartphone.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series Teaser Video Mocks Apple’s Delayed AI Feature Rollout

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE is expected to launch in South Korea on September 19, priced under KRW 1 million (roughly Rs. 63,200). It may come in Light Blue, Dark Blue, Black, and White shades. It will likely be powered by the Exynos 2400 SoC, and ship with Android 16-based One UI 8. The handset may feature a 6.7-inch 120Hz full-HD+ display, a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup, a 12-megapixel front camera, and a 4,900mAh battery with 45W fast charging.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Launch Date, Price Leaked Ahead of Imminent Debut

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge battery details have surfaced online, and the latest claims are in line with a previous leak. If the new information is true, then the rumoured Galaxy S-series smartphone would see a decent upgrade in its battery size. Since it is expected to succeed the Galaxy S25 Edge, which was unveiled on May 13, the rumoured phone might have a similar thin design.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge Battery Specifications Leak Hints at Larger Battery Than the Galaxy S25 Edge

description: Instagram on Tuesday announced a new set of features to help creators keep a track of their audience growth metrics more effectively. The Meta-owned social media platform is rolling out insights for likes on photo carousels and Reels, showcasing the exact moment and the slide when others decided to like the post. Meanwhile, post-level demographics can help creators understand what type of content is resonating with their audience.
title: Instagram Announces Post-Level Demographics, Viewers Metric, and More Features for Creators

description: The Made by Google event is scheduled for August 20 where the tech giant will take the wraps off its latest flagship-grade handsets, ubiquitously known as the Pixel 10 series. Ahead of their anticipated debut, complete renders of the Pixel 10 Pro have surfaced which showcase the phone from all sides and reveal the design changes expected this year. It is shown in the Obsidian colour option that Google previously teased via its social media handle.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Leaked Renders Reportedly Showcase All of the Design Changes Coming This Year

description: If you’re transitioning from the sub-Rs. 10,000 segment and don't want to invest a huge amount on a device which, more often than not, gets outdated within a few years, then we curated a list of the top smartphones under Rs. 15,000 in India to help you make an informed buying decision.
title: Top Mobile Phones Under Rs 15,000 in India (August 2025): Redmi Note 14 SE 5G, Tecno Pova 7, iQOO Z10x, and More
